member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar
member.summary: The ShapeToolBar control displays image buttons representing selected shapes defined via the Shape class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ShapeToolBar class.

member.summary: Handles the ButtonClick event of this toolbar.

member.summary: Updates the toolbar buttons depending on the current document.

member.summary: Creates the image list with shape images using the current control settings.

member.summary: Toggles button texts.

member.summary: Toggles button images.

member.summary: Recreates the toolbar buttons.

member.summary: Recreates the toolbar button images.

member.summary: A collection of identifiers of the shapes to be used with the toolbar.

member.summary: Gets or sets the identifiers of all shapes available in the toolbar.

member.summary: Hides the Buttons property from the public.

member.summary: Hides the ToolBar.ImageList property from the public.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.ShowText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display shape identifiers as toolbar button titles.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.ShowImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display shape icons in the toolbar buttons.

member.summary: Hides the Control.AllowDrop property from the public.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.AllowDrag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether dragging shapes from the toolbar to a diagram is enabled.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.DefaultNodeSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial size of nodes created by dragging shapes from the toolbar to the diagram canvas.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.ButtonImageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the icon images displayed inside toolbar buttons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.ShapeFillColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of toolbar button icons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.SelectedShape
member.summary: Gets the Shape currently selected in the toolbar.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.DrawNode
member.summary: Raised to perform custom drawing on a toolbar's shape image.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.ShapeToolBar.ShapeClicked
member.summary: Raised when the user clicks a shape button.
